column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Such a great ramen place!  Food is always fresh
column3: and arrives on time. The servers are so friendly and the environment is fun and clean.  My favorite dishes are the tempura Brussel sprouts
column4: spicy chicken ramen and the rice bowls.  We've eaten here many times and it's our favorite ramen place ever.  Great food. Great service. Fair prices. Cute decor and fun environment.
